refnamediv.refpurpose: read a colormap from a framebuffer

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: fb-cmap reads a colormap from a framebuffer. A colormap filename into which to write the data can be given, otherwise the data will appear on standard output. The format of the colormap output is described in cmap5.

By default, the display is assumed to be 512x512 pixels; by specifying the -H flag, the size is changed to 1024x1024. This size distinction is important for devices like the Adage framebuffers which have different operating modes based on the display size.

refsection.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsection.para: The message "can't read colormap" occurs if the read failed. No output will be produced. This usually means that the currently selected framebuffer either does not have, or can not support, a colormap. This will usually be the case, for example, with a disk file "framebuffer".
